message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping for a more reasonable price. Can we work towards something closer to $120?
I understand you're looking for a more reasonable price, Bob. However, I have to make a profit, so I can offer you a slight discount. How about $135?
Thanks for considering my request, Alice. I'd like to stay within my budget. Could we possibly negotiate down to $120?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a living. How about $130?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, could we possibly settle on $120?
I can see you're really serious about getting this product, Bob. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out on a good deal. How about $127.50?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. Considering my budget, would it be possible to reach an agreement at $120?
